standards.title: Understands that people have to make choices between wants and needs and evaluates the outcomes of those choices.

components.description: Analyze the costs and benefits of economic choices made by groups and individuals in the past or present.
Describe the production, distribution, and consumption of goods, services, and resources in societies from the past or in the present.
Explain how scarce resources have affected international trade in the past or present.

standards.title: Understands the government’s role in the economy.

components.description: Explain the role of government in the world’s economies through the creation of money, taxation, and spending in the past or present.

standards.title: Understands the economic issues and problems that all societies face.

components.description: Explain the distribution of wealth and sustainability of resources in the world.
Explain barriers to trade and how those barriers influence trade among nations.
